sentences.en: And yet, it is also my rebirth that will soon begin!
sentences.cn: 却也是我的新生期快开始了!

sentences.en: Bound to wither in the rebirth, bud growth, quiet fragrance.
sentences.cn: 必将在枯萎中重生, 花蕾的成长, 清幽的芬芳.

sentences.en: But it also comes amid a rebirth of the Chinese film industry.
sentences.cn: 不过这一切正值中国电影产业复苏之际.

sentences.en: Check out the rebirth of the original 3 D bowling game!
sentences.cn: 游戏有5个新的赛道,25种式样的保龄球,同时球的重量、度和灵活都可以调节.

sentences.en: Christians have long used the egg as the symbol of Christ's rebirth.
sentences.cn: 长久以来,基督徒都以蛋作为基督复活的象征.

sentences.en: Improved Tranquility? Removed and replaced by the new talent Improved Rebirth.
sentences.cn: 增加宁静 - 被删除,并被新的天赋强化重生所取代.

sentences.en: Injured cell ream of repair and maintenance cell rebirth.
sentences.cn: 修护受损的强胞令细胞再生.

sentences.en: Regulate the allergy, flush, have fever the phenomenon, ream cell rebirth Reorganization.
sentences.cn: 调节过敏 、 发红 、 发热现象, 令细胞再生重组.

sentences.en: Spring is a wonderful season to celebrate rebirth and new life.
sentences.cn: 春季是庆祝复苏和新生的美好季节.

sentences.en: Tea dance rebirth by water, water and drunk by tea fragrance.
sentences.cn: 茶因水而舞重生, 水因茶而醉清香.

sentences.en: the cycle of birth, death and rebirth
The day always like this died in darkness indarkness the rebirth.
sentences.cn: 日子总是这样在黑暗中死去又在黑暗中重生.

sentences.en: The hotel is awaiting its rebirth.
the seasonal cycle of death and rebirth
They look forward to their rebirth as a nation.
sentences.cn: 他们期待着全民族的新生.

trans.tran_en: when an important idea, feeling, or organization becomes strong or popular again
